Research Experience

  • 2022 - Present
    Graduate Researcher
    Institute for Genomics and Systems Biology, University of Chicago
    • Developed **Glycan Proximity Sequencing (GPS)** for integrated mRNA, protein, glycan, and glycoform profiling in single cells.
    • Created **Spatial Proximity Sequencing (SProx)** for mapping protein interactions in tissues.
    • Built computational pipelines (Python, R, Scanpy, Seurat, SLURM) for multi-omic analysis.
    • {"Discovered CD8⁺ T cell subset (CD45"=>"poly-LacNAChigh) as a glycosylation-regulated population."}
  • 2021 - 2022
    Graduate Researcher
    Department of Chemistry, University of Chicago
    • Modeled nanoparticle PK/ADME with Python.
    • Performed survival analysis of tumor-bearing mice using Kaplan-Meier and log-rank testing.
  • 2019 - 2021
    Undergraduate Researcher
    Department of Polymer Science and Engineering, Zhejiang University
    • Conducted Monte Carlo simulations of polymer chain conformations and properties.

Professional Experience

  • 2021
    Venture Capital Analyst Intern
    Kaitai Capital, Biomedicine & Healthcare, Shanghai, China
    • Evaluated cell therapies (CAR-T, TCR-T) and gene therapies for CNS disorders.
    • Analyzed 15+ biotech companies and supported due diligence.
    • Contributed to 3 pitch decks and 10+ memos for investment decisions.
